chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 12 has the following problem:
Hello, could you please make sure it arrives on the 4th and not the 5th? 🙏 I just broke my phone (bought from backmarket too) and I'm leaving for a trip on the 5th afternoon..
Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We're getting ready to ship the parcel and want to ensure everything's perfect. Can we quickly re-confirm the customer's address?

We are committed to delivering your parcel by June 4th and have informed our logistics partner about this arrangement. However, please note that while we will make every effort to meet this deadline, we cannot guarantee the delivery date.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile, 

Nom du destinataire : ROUX Anne-Sophie
Adresse : 62 rue Greneta
Code postal : 75002
Ville : Paris
Pays : France
Numéro de téléphone : 0767385350
Mail : annesophie.roux@sciencespo.fr

Thank you for your help!
Best regards, Johanetto, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for providing the customer's address, your assistance is greatly appreciated. The order is currently being shipped under the tracking number GH202901095JB. Here is the tracking link:
https://www.chronopost.fr/tracking-no-cms/suivi-page?listeNumerosLT=GH202901095JB&langue=fr_FR

Regards,

Dear Backcare,
